TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {8662=In June Johnny Thomas became the first member of Sidney Lowe's first full recruiting class. The 6-foot-5, 210-pound forward from Greensboro (N.C.) Day High picked State over offers from Miami, Virginia Tech and George Washington. Wake Forest had also begun to show serious interest. Basketball's early signing period started Wednesday, but Thomas is not going to sign until Saturday.}

textAfterTable: Latest News Thomas gets ready to sign with NC State11/08/2006 TheWolfpacker.com In June Johnny Thomas became the first member of Sidney Lowe's first full recruiting class. The 6-foot-5, 210-pound forward from Greensboro (N.C.) Day High picked State over offers from Miami, Virginia Tech and George Washington. Wake Forest had also begun to show serious interest. Basketball's early signing period started Wednesday, but Thomas is not going to sign until Saturday. J.J. Hickson makes his choice 10/12/2006 Rivals.com Basketball Recruiting Fastbreak Friday 09/08/2006 Rivals.com Basketball Recruiting Johnny Thomas selects the Wolfpack 06/26/2006 TheWolfpacker.com Johnny Thomas approaches decision time 06/20/2006 TheWolfpacker.com Surprises of the Tournament of Champions 05/31/2006 Rivals.com Basketball Recruiting Thomas emerges at the TOC 05/31/2006 Rivals.com Basketball Recruiting TOC - Saturday 05/28/2006 Rivals.com Basketball Recruiting Print Recruit Search Advanced Search »
